closedcaptions_select_language_desc: Choose the localization language to use
menu_closedcaptions_use_fadein_desc: Captions will start out transparent and become more visible over a short duration
menu_closedcaptions_set_max_desc: Set the maximum number of captions to show
menu_closedcaptions_set_fadeout_time_des: How long it takes a caption to disappear when the sound ends
menu_closedcaptions_set_font_size_desc: Change the size of captions' text
menu_closedcaptions_caption_variation_mo: Choose how to caption voiceline variations
menu_closedcaptions_caption_order_desc: Choose in what order new captions will be sorted
menu_closedcaptions_use_player_names_des: Use the player's name instead of the heister character's name.
menu_closedcaptions_use_allcaps_names_de: Put speaker names in all capital letters.
menu_closedcaptions_category_contractor_: Enable Captions for Contractor Voice-Over lines.
menu_closedcaptions_category_heister_dia: Enable Captions for Heister voice lines.
menu_closedcaptions_category_heister_spo: Enable Captions for Heisters Spotting Enemies
menu_closedcaptions_category_heister_kil: Enable Captions for Heisters Killing Enemies
menu_closedcaptions_category_enemy_dialo: Enable Captions for important Enemy Dialogue.
menu_closedcaptions_category_enemy_chatt: Enable Captions for non-important Enemy Dialogue. (Inclues Specials)
menu_closedcaptions_category_specialenem: Enable Captions for Special Enemy Chatter.
Enable Captions for Special Enemy Deaths.
